original_text: Then Samuel told the people the rights and duties of the kingship, and he wrote them in a book and laid it up before the Lord. Then Samuel sent all the people away, each one to his home.
korean_text: 사무엘이 나라의 제도를 백성에게 말하고 책에 기록하여 여호와 앞에 두고 모든 백성을 각기 집으로 보내매

sentences.original_text: the rights and duties of the kingship
he wrote them in a book
laid it up before the Lord
Then Samuel sent all the people away
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 사무엘이 모든 백성을 돌려보내니
